solbari wyawasthawa yatathe 1948 pebarawari 04 dina shri lankawata nidahasa labuna da eya namamathrika nidahasak wu bawin gasat nama da ee ayurin pawathuni. 1972 mayi 22 di shri lankawa prajathanthrika samajawadi janarajaya bawata pathwiya.
naya yamata eya hethu wuna kiyala thamayi danata apa saka karanne yayi nagarika komasariswaraya apage panayata pilithuru lesin sandahan kaleya.

jathika yatithala pahasukam sanwardhana wyapruthi nisa aarthika wardhanayata jawayak labina. 1867 di rusiyawen alaskawa mila di ganima nisa rate maha bhumiye wyapthiya sampurna wiya. 1890 di sawuth dakota hi wundad ni nam ganga asalabada siddha wu samula ghathanaya indiyanu yuddha wala awasan pradhana satana se salake. 1893 di ehi wasaya karana lada amerikan wasiyan wisin pasifik hi hawayi rajyaye aadiwasi rajanduwa kumanthranayakin balayen paha karannata samath wuha. 1898 di hawayi dupath eksath janapadayata aanda ganna ladi.
